name: Stickman Bmx Stunt Rider - Dirt Bike Racing
name_original: Stickman Bmx Stunt Rider - Dirt Bike Racing
description:
Stickman is a good biker. He is going to take a long ride in the doodle world.

Come and explore doodle world with stickman!

Highlights:
•Realistic physics
•High speed racing
•Different kinds of roads to play
•Universal app, play on iPod, iPhone and iPad
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center support
•It’s FREE!!!
